headline: Trump 🍊🔥 DEMANDS 5YR Social Media DUMP 💩📱 for TOURIST ENTRY ‼️
text:
YO 🇺🇸 BORDER BROS 👮‍♂️💪, Trump Daddy 🍊🦅 BACK in the WHITE HOUSE 🏰 since JAN ❄️ is SLAMMING 🔨 the DOORS 🚪 on FOREIGN TOURIST SIMPS 🧳😩! New CBP 🛂 & DHS 🔥 proposal DROPPING 💣 in the FEDERAL REGISTER 📜: VISA-WAIVE CUCKS from UK 🇬🇧, Ireland 🍀, France 🥖, Oz 🦘, Japan 🇯🇵 & 40+ more gotta SPILL their 5-YR SOCIAL MEDIA HISTORY 📱💦📈 before ESTA ✈️ APPROVAL! No more sneaky 👻 terror tweets or anti-Semite rants 😡🕎 – or you're BOUNCED 🏃‍♂️💨 like Epstein's GUEST LIST 🚫🍆!

Current ESTA? Just BASIC DEETS + $40 💸🍑 for 90-DAY STAYS 🏖️ & 2-YR MULTI-TRIPS 🔄. But NOW? COUGH UP 📤 phone nums 📞 from LAST 5 YRS, emails 📧 from 10 YRS BACK 🕰️, & FAMILY TREE 🧑‍👩‍👧‍👦 GOSSIP! Cuz Trump's JAN EXEC ORDER 📜👑 'PROTECTING 🇺🇸 FROM FOREIGN TERROR CUCKS 🧨🤡 & PUBLIC SAFETY THREATS ⚠️' says SCREEN HARDER 🕵️‍♂️🔍! Already MAKING student visa kids & H1B tech bros PUBLICIZE their feeds 📲👀 – now TOURISTS JOIN THE ORGY OF OVERSHARE 💦📱!

State Dept SIMP 💅: 'AMERIKKKA EXPECTS SAFETY LOCKS 🔒 – Trump's DOING IT DAILY 😤!' Post-DC SHOOTING 🔫 by AFGHAN SUSPECT 🕌😱 on NATIONAL GUARD BROS 🛡️, they're EXPANDING TRAVEL BAN 🚫 to 19+ AFRICA/MIDEAST/CARIBBEAN SPOTS 🌍🛑 – NO MORE JIHAD JIHAD WALKS 🕌🚶‍♂️!

BAD TIMING MUCH? 😩⏰ US HOSTING MEN'S WORLD CUP ⚽🏆 w/ CANADA 🍁 MEXICO 🇲🇽 NEXT YR & LA 2028 OLYMPICS 🥇🏟️ – but TOURISTS GONNA GHOST 👻 cuz WAITING FOREVER ⏳ for APPROVALS! EFF'S Sophia Cope 😤📵 CALLING IT 'CIVIL LIBERTIES BUTT-HURT 💥🕊️' & Fragomen LAWYERS ⚖️ SAY DELAYS GALORE ⏰😭. Trump's TARIFFS 💰📈 got CANUCKS 🍁 BOYCOTTING 🇺🇸 – 10 STRAIGHT MOONS 📉 of DECLINE, that's 25% of VISITORS & $20BN 🤑💸 VANISHED! WTTC SAYS USA ONLY 184 ECONOMY DROPPING INTL SPEND in 2025 📉🍑 – THANKS OBAMA... er, TRUMP! 😂🔥

Public GET 60 DAYS 🗓️ to COMMENT 🤬📝 before this SOCIAL MEDIA SHAKEDOWN 📱🍑 GOES LIVE! Delete those THIRST TRAPS 💦📸 & MEME DUMPS 😂 NOW, or STAY HOME CRYING 😭🏠 – MAGA BORDER WALL JUST GOT A DIGITAL MOAT 🏰💻! Trump said 'BUILD THE WALL' 🧱 but meant 'BUILD THE FEED SCAN' 🔍📱 – NO MORE FOREIGN TROLLS TROLLING USA SOIL 🇺🇸🚫! 😂🍆💥
